alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:40PM CDT until May 09 at 3:24AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...Kansas... Elk River near Tiff City affecting McDonald County. Spring River near Waco affecting Jasper County. Spring River at Carthage affecting Jasper County. Spring River above Baxter Springs affecting Cherokee County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Shoal Creek near Joplin affecting Newton and Jasper Counties. For the Spring River Basin...including Baxter Springs, Waco, Carthage...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring River near Waco. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, the Highway 171 Bridge downstream from the gage site floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 26.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 4.9 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 845 PM CDT.
